roleset.name: divide (often social/cultural) or layer (geology), social/cultural/geological etc division into layers
roleset.note: STRATIFY-V NOTES: Frame file created by Arrick based on frame file for 'activate'. (from stratify.01-v)
STRATIFICATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, stratify.01. Corresponds to VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from stratification.01-n)

example.name: cause
example.text: Income distribution often stratifies a society.

example.name: adjectival/passive
example.text: the socially stratified Paiwan tribe has a wide range of cloting and cloth colors.

example.name: just arg2
example.text: Winds are rarely strong enough to prevent thermal stratification from forming.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: If we look at the magnitudinal stratification of this universe, we go from , as we interpret it , and with our current ability to decern at sub nano levels , the smallest subatomic particles through atoms , molecules , solids , constructs , and on , and on , and on , to planets , star systems , galaxies , and on to our entire known universe .
